  • FHEW: Bootstrapping Homomorphic Encryption in Less than a Second
  • Homomorphic Encryption for Arithmetic of Approximate Numbers
  • TFHE: Fast Fully Homomorphic Encryption over the Torus
  • Secure Large-Scale Genome-Wide Association Studies Using Homomorphic Encryption
  • CryptoNets: Applying Neural Networks to Encrypted Data with High Throughput and Accuracy
  • The Knowledge Complexity of Interactive Proof Systems
  • A Note on Efficient Zero-knowledge Proofs and Arguments
  • Computationally Sound Proofs
  • Pinocchio: Nearly Practical Verifiable Computation
  • On the Size of Pairing-based Non-interactive Arguments
  • Scalable, Transparent, and Post-Quantum Secure Computational Integrity

  • Our Data, Ourselves: Privacy via Distributed Noise Generation

W6, 09/23 - 09/27 DP Mechanisms DP Mechanisms

  • Renyi Differential Privacy
  • Randomized Response: A Survey Technique for Eliminating Evasive Answer Bias
  • Universally Utility-Maximizing Privacy Mechanisms
  • Understanding the Sparse Vector Technique for Differential Privacy
  • Boosting the Accuracy of Differentially Private Histograms through Consistency
  • Differential Privacy via Wavelet Transforms
  • Privtree: A Differentially Private Algorithm for Hierarchical Decompositions
  • Differentially Private Spatial Decompositions
  • A Data-and-Workload-Aware Algorithm for Range Queries under Differential Privacy
  • Differentially Private k-Means Clustering
  • RAPPOR: Randomized Aggregatable Privacy-Preserving Ordinal Response
